org.starhope.appius.net
Class ListeningThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.starhope.appius.net.ListeningThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Object>, Runnable, GetsConfigReload
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebSocketListener
public class ListeningThread
extends Thread
implements GetsConfigReload, Comparable<Object>

This is a listener thread to accept connections and create an appropriate ServerProcessor (ServerThread)

Author:
brpocock@star-hope.org
